subsection.subsectiontext: Not less than 30 days before putting into public use a new or amended document or contract form intended for use by holders and containing the terms and conditions of a materials and labour warranty or water penetration warranty, a warranty provider must submit the document or contract form to the Homeowner Protection Office.
